channel.title: Vote for money/Buy items
channel.description:
How would i set this up
1. when a player votes they get 5M
2. When someone buys a wepong via paypal they get it in there inventory straight away ?
If anyone can help please do. Also if this works can it be used with a 000webhost.com account ?
